org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.web
Class AePruningBean

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.web.AeAbstractAdminBean
      org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.web.AePruningBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeErrorAwareBean
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeProcessPruningBean
public abstract class AePruningBean
extends AeAbstractAdminBean

Provides a facility for deleting data from the database. The user selects a criteria, hits the delete button, and then gets a count of how many rows will be affected and then must either confirm the deletions or cancel them.
